The Obsolete Book in a Post-Obsolete World, as Represented by a Post-Obsolete Book About Dance

A performable website in the spirit (and tutelage) of Michelle Ellsworth – with text-to-speech voice-over, transparencies, party hats, diagrams, whiskey, handouts, and music by [The Widow’s Bane][Widow’s Bane.

Mortimer Leech was gracious about my use of their music:

Follow your bliss, Mia. Take no prisoners. We’re already dead. What the fuck do we want with money?

Thank you Mr. Leech.

The piece requires a few props:

  • overhead projector
  • party hats
  • noise makers
  • an old book about dance
  • 10-page printed handouts
  • tweed jacket
  • whiskey
